title: New: Yumi Zouma – Alena
body:
Returning with their first new material since the EP that gained them worldwide plaudits, alongside helping them piece together shows in the US and the UK and a slot as Lorde’s openers in New Zealand, it’s safe to say things are going pretty well for **Yumi Zouma**.

Released through Cascine, _Alena_ feels like a more honest representation of their live sound; groovier, more upbeat and with roots in 80’s dance music, it’s another step on what is becoming a fascinating story for Yumi Zouma.
